definition[0]: the qualities, emotions etc of someone or something that are easy to notice, but which are not the only or not the real qualities, emotions etc
example[0]: Half an hour later, Enid had calmed down, at least on the surface.
example[1]: Prejudice is never far beneath the surface (=often appears) in the region.
example[2]: Violence has risen to the surface in the inner city.
example[3]: On the surface, it seems a simple story.
example[4]: I sensed a lot of tension and jealousy beneath the surface.
